item.title: End the Ukraine Intelligence Freeze
item.description: The cutoff is a gift to Russia. A reversal can’t come soon enough.

item.description: When it comes to European tech policy, just say no.

item.title: Study: Concealed Carriers Do A Better Job Of Stopping Active Shooters Than Police
item.description: We found that concealed carry permit holders stopped 51.5 percent of active shootings, compared to 44.6 percent stopped by police.
